DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to test the reliability of the FAST-O Rating Scale in patients at acute wards or psychiatric intensive care units.
DOC.brief_title: Quality Project to Evaluate and Validate the FAST-O Rating Scale
DOC.criteria: Patients with acute psychotic symptoms attending the acute ward or psychiatric intensive care unit
DOC.keyword: Observational assessments of patients with acute psychotic symptoms
